description:
Climate change is altering how the Amazon sends moisture to the rest of South America, which will make extreme climate events more common

The post South Brazil likely to see even more extreme rain in future appeared first on The Brazilian Report.
title: South Brazil likely to see even more extreme rain in future

description:
The House Social Security and Family Committee approved a motion of censure against pop stars Madonna, Anitta, and Pablo Vittar for their participation in a large concert held at Copacabana Beach on May 4. Madonna’s free concert in Rio was the last of The Celebration Tour, the 12th tour of her career. The show was […]

The post Madonna receives “motion of censure” from Brazilian politicians appeared first on The Brazilian Report.
title: Madonna receives “motion of censure” from Brazilian politicians

description:
The board of Brazil’s oil giant Petrobras on Friday elected Magda Chambriard as the government-controlled company’s new CEO, replacing Jean Paul Prates. According to a statement, Ms. Chambriard also immediately took a seat on the board, without the need for approval by shareholders. Back in March, Mr. Prates said on social media that the Petrobras […]

The post Petrobras elects Chambriard as new CEO appeared first on The Brazilian Report.
title: Petrobras elects Chambriard as new CEO
